room_title: Escape room "The Chocolate Factory" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
room_address: 8019 Corporate Dr Suite J Nottingham, MD 21236
room_description:
The old Chocolate Master wasnâ€™t feeling so good. This was the first time in years when he missed an order of his famous chocolate treats. Soon after, the newspaper announced his passing. The great Chocolate Factory closed its doors forever.
However, a year later there was an odd rumor that the Master was on the lookout for a successor and left behind clues on how to open the unbreakable doors. You have one hour to get into the factory, find the greatest recipe and replicate it to become the next Chocolate Master and own the factory.
